credit_line: Gift of Chermayeff and Geismar Associates
title: The Invisible City,  Poster for the International Design Conference, Aspen
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
description: Rows of airline luggage tags from airports around the world from ABJ (Abidjan, Ivory Coast), at upper left, to WAW (Warsaw), at lower right.  Text at bottom begins:  "Airports are a link to the peace and places of the world. . ." and is followed by a key to the airport codes on the tags above.
name: Poster
